meanings.definition: The process of converting into graphite.
meanings.sent1: During the graphitizations, the carbon changes into graphite.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the graphitizations of carbon to understand its properties better.
meanings.sent3: The classroom erupted in laughter when the teacher accidentally mentioned graphitizations during the art lesson.
meanings.sent4: Her transformation was like the slow graphitizations of a pencil, gradually becoming darker and more defined.
meanings.sent5: The graphitizations of the coal mine walls created a mesmerizing pattern of black lines.
